name: 3D World Tank Parking - Allied War Army Blitz Driving Force
name_original: 3D World Tank Parking - Allied War Army Blitz Driving Force
description:
3D Army Base Parking demands ultimate driving precision and your very, very best parking skills. Use your multi-directional camera to get into the heart of the action in this truly immersive 3D environment. Drive your way around the secret desert Military Training Base by using a variety of army vehicles and your goal is to reach the designated parking zone in each of the challenging levels.

With 4 Army Vehicles for you to get to grips with including a Jeep, Tank, Lorry and Armoured Truck, are you ready to take on the 33 intense day and night driving missions in all types of weather? Your Military vehicles are randomly selected on each mission for a superior gameplay experience. All you need is a rock steady nerve and the skills to manoeuvre your vehicles past burning machinery, parked vehicles and across the roughest terrain and through the tightest driving turns imaginable!

Drop into the army depot for steering wheels, pick up essential vehicle repair kits or ammo up with extra lives and even play god and gain total control over the terrain weather.

Main Features:

- Multi Directional Camera
- Immersive 3D Army Base Environment
- 33 Day and Night parking challenges
- 4 Army Vehicles, randomly selected
- Realistic precision driving simulator
- Experience weather conditions and rough terrain
- Weather Control
- Awesome Soundtrack
